name: Pocket Pairs
description:
Pairs, also known as Match Match, Match Up, Memory, Pelmanism, Shinkei-suijaku, Pexeso or Concentration is a card-matching memory game.

Enjoy some downtime after a gruelling match and play a relaxing game with Paisley Johnson, Firehose MacDonald, Sonny Blackwell, and Tanktop McGee!

Visit https://gruman.co/pairs for more information and the Privacy Policy.
